OTAMENDI TO ATLETICO?

Atletico Madrid have identified Manchester City defender Nicolas Otamendi as a potential replacement for outgoing Diego Godin, according to AS in Spain.

Otamendi has been a bit-part player for the Premier League champions this season and has reportedly already held discussions with Atletico director Andrea Berta over a move.
